title: South African bank FirstRand reports 5% rise in FY profit
text:
South African bank FirstRand reports 5% rise in FY profit

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Sep 05, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. South African bank FirstRand reports 5% rise in FY profit JOHANNESBURG, Sep 5 (Reuters) - South African lender FirstRand said on Thursday its profit rose 5% in the year to June 30. Diluted headline earnings per share (HEPS) rose to 497.2 cents ($0.3263) from 472.7 cents a year earlier. HEPS strips out certain one-off items and is the main profit measure in South Africa. ($1 = 15.2369 rand)

South African bank FirstRand reports 5% rise in FY profit
description: South African bank FirstRand reports 5% rise in FY profit
